description: Quick, simple, healthy comfort food for those busy nights. This vegan Philly portobello "steak" sandwich is full of veggies, a touch of optional spice, and loads of flavor!
keywords: healthy philly sandwich, vegan philly steak sandwich
name: Vegan Cheesesteak Sandwich
recipeIngredient: 1 teaspoon fresh chopped garlic (, about 1 medium garlic clove)
Your favorite oil for sautéing (, or veggie broth if not using oil)
1 small green bell pepper (, thinly sliced)
1 small red bell pepper (, thinly sliced)
1 small sweet or yellow onion (, thinly sliced)
1/2 cup veggie broth (, low sodium if needed)
6 hot dog buns or sub sandwich rolls
2 cups fresh spinach (, sauté with veggies)
2 spicy peppers (, thinly sliced, sauté with veggies for spicy version)

recipeInstructions.text: Sauté garlic in a pan using oil or broth until lightly browned.
Add veggies and cook covered until mushrooms release some liquid.
Remove cover and add parsley, salt and pepper and mix well.
Add flour and veggie broth and continue to cook until juice thickens.
Remove from heat and serve in buns.
Top with one of the cheese sauces or sliced cheese if you want an extra layer of creaminess.
